# Ambigram Nurikabe

This is a pair of [Nurikabes](https://puzz.link/rules.html?nurikabe) presented as an [ambigram](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ambigram) - that is, you can turn one puzzle 180Â° to get the other one. For convenience, both copies (right side up and upside down) are provided in the one link.   

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2024/ambigramNurikabe1.png)](https://zwegner.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
